mapper.select: select /* AdminManage.getGroupUserList - 그룹에 속한 사용자 리스트 조회 */ a.we_user_idx as weUserIdx , a.we_user_name AS weUserName from we_user a, we_group_user b where b.we_use_yn = 'Y' and a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx and b.we_group_idx = #{groupIdx,jdbcType=NUMERIC} order by a.we_user_idx

SELECT /* SpaceManage.getSpaceInfo - 해당 공간정보 조회 */ a.we_space_idx AS spaceIdx ,a.we_space_name AS spaceName ,REPLACE(a.we_space_desc, '\r\n', '
') AS spaceDesc ,a.we_space_exposed AS exposed ,a.we_view_privacy AS viewPrivacy ,a.we_edit_privacy AS editPrivacy ,CONCAT(b.we_img_path, '/', b.we_img_name) AS profileImg ,a.we_ins_user AS adminUserIdx FROM we_space a, we_space_image b WHERE a.we_space_idx = b.we_space_idx AND a.we_space_idx = #{spaceIdx}

SELECT /* SpaceManage.getMySpaceList - 내가 개설한 공간리스트를 가져온다. */ a.we_space_idx , a.we_space_name , a.we_ins_date , a.we_view_privacy , IFNULL(c.we_space_idx, 0) AS favorited , IFNULL(b.cnt,0) AS wikiCnt , d.we_user_nick FROM we_space a LEFT JOIN (SELECT we_space_idx, COUNT(we_wiki_idx) AS cnt FROM we_wiki GROUP BY we_space_idx) b ON a.we_space_idx = b.we_space_idx LEFT JOIN (SELECT we_space_idx FROM we_favorite WHERE we_user_idx=#{userIdx,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND we_favorite_type='SPACE' AND we_use_yn='Y') c ON a.we_space_idx = c.we_space_idx INNER JOIN we_user d ON a.we_ins_user=d.we_user_idx WHERE a.we_ins_user = #{userIdx} order by we_ins_date desc

SELECT /* SpaceManage.getMyEntryList - 내가 가입한 공간리스트를 가져온다. */ we_space_idx , we_space_name , we_ins_date , we_view_privacy , favorited , wikiCnt , we_user_nick FROM ( ( SELECT g.we_space_idx , g.we_space_name , g.we_ins_date , g.we_view_privacy , IFNULL(e.we_space_idx, 0) AS favorited , IFNULL(d.wikiCnt,0) AS wikiCnt , g.we_user_nick FROM (SELECT a.we_space_idx , a.we_space_name , a.we_ins_date , a.we_view_privacy , f.we_user_nick FROM we_space a INNER JOIN we_user f ON a.we_ins_user=f.we_user_idx INNER JOIN we_space_group b ON a.we_space_idx = b.we_space_idx INNER JOIN we_group_user c ON b.we_group_idx = c.we_group_idx WHERE c.we_user_idx=#{userIdx} AND b.we_view_permit = 1 AND a.we_ins_user !=#{userIdx}) g LEFT JOIN (SELECT we_space_idx, COUNT(we_wiki_idx) AS wikiCnt FROM we_wiki WHERE we_use_yn='Y' GROUP BY we_space_idx) d ON g.we_space_idx = d.we_space_idx LEFT JOIN (SELECT we_space_idx FROM we_favorite WHERE we_user_idx=#{userIdx}) e ON g.we_space_idx = e.we_space_idx ) UNION ( SELECT f.we_space_idx , f.we_space_name , f.we_ins_date , f.we_view_privacy , IFNULL(d.we_space_idx, 0) AS favorited , IFNULL(c.wikiCnt,0) AS wikiCnt , f.we_user_nick FROM ( SELECT a.we_space_idx , a.we_space_name , a.we_ins_date , a.we_view_privacy , e.we_user_nick FROM we_space a INNER JOIN we_space_user b ON a.we_space_idx = b.we_space_idx INNER JOIN we_user e ON a.we_ins_user=e.we_user_idx WHERE a.we_ins_user !=#{userIdx} AND b.we_view_permit = 1 AND b.we_user_idx=#{userIdx} ) f LEFT JOIN (SELECT we_space_idx, COUNT(we_wiki_idx) AS wikiCnt FROM we_wiki WHERE we_use_yn='Y' GROUP BY we_space_idx) c ON f.we_space_idx = c.we_space_idx LEFT JOIN (SELECT we_space_idx FROM we_favorite WHERE we_user_idx=#{userIdx}) d ON f.we_space_idx = d.we_space_idx ) ) A ORDER BY we_ins_date DESC

SELECT c.we_user_idx , c.we_group_name , e.we_user_name , CAST(IFNULL(d.we_insert_permit,0) AS CHAR) AS we_insert_permit , CAST(IFNULL(d.we_view_permit,0) AS CHAR) AS we_view_permit FROM (SELECT a.we_group_idx, a.we_user_idx, b.we_group_name FROM we_group_user a, we_group_info b WHERE a.we_group_idx = b.we_group_idx) c LEFT JOIN (SELECT we_user_idx, we_insert_permit, we_edit_permit, we_view_permit FROM we_space_user WHERE we_space_idx = #{userIdx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}) d ON c.we_user_idx = d.we_user_idx INNER JOIN we_user e ON c.we_user_idx = e.we_user_idx

SELECT c.we_user_idx , c.we_group_name , e.we_user_name FROM (SELECT a.we_group_idx, a.we_user_idx, b.we_group_name FROM we_group_user a, we_group_info b WHERE a.we_group_idx = b.we_group_idx) c INNER JOIN we_user e ON c.we_user_idx = e.we_user_idx

SELECT a.we_group_idx , a.we_group_name , CAST(IFNULL(b.we_insert_permit,0) AS CHAR) AS we_insert_permit , CAST(IFNULL(b.we_view_permit,0) AS CHAR) AS we_view_permit FROM we_group_info a LEFT JOIN (SELECT we_group_idx, we_insert_permit, we_edit_permit, we_view_permit FROM we_space_group WHERE we_space_idx=#{userIdx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}) b ON a.we_group_idx = b.we_group_idx

SELECT a.we_space_idx , a.we_space_name , a.we_ins_date , a.we_view_privacy , IFNULL(c.we_space_idx, 0) AS favorited , IFNULL(COUNT(b.we_wiki_idx),0) AS wikiCnt , d.we_user_nick , a.we_ins_user FROM we_space a LEFT JOIN we_wiki b ON a.we_space_idx = b.we_space_idx LEFT JOIN (SELECT we_space_idx FROM we_favorite WHERE we_user_idx=#{userIdx,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND we_favorite_type='SPACE' AND we_use_yn='Y') c ON a.we_space_idx = c.we_space_idx INNER JOIN we_user d ON a.we_admin_idx=d.we_user_idx WHERE a.we_space_exposed = 'Y' AND a.we_use_yn='Y' GROUP BY a.we_space_idx , a.we_space_name , a.we_ins_date , a.we_view_privacy , d.we_user_nick ORDER BY we_ins_date DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT a.we_space_idx , a.we_space_name , a.we_ins_date , a.we_view_privacy , IFNULL(c.we_space_idx, 0) AS favorited , d.we_user_nick , a.we_ins_user , DATE_FORMAT(a.we_ins_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS insert_date FROM we_space a LEFT JOIN we_wiki b ON a.we_space_idx = b.we_space_idx and b.WE_USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN (SELECT we_space_idx FROM we_favorite WHERE we_user_idx=#{userIdx,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND we_favorite_type='SPACE' AND we_use_yn='Y') c ON a.we_space_idx = c.we_space_idx INNER JOIN we_user d ON a.we_admin_idx=d.we_user_idx WHERE a.we_space_exposed = 'Y' AND a.we_use_yn='Y' GROUP BY a.we_space_idx , a.we_space_name , a.we_ins_date , a.we_view_privacy , d.we_user_nick ORDER BY we_ins_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}

SELECT a.we_file_idx , a.we_file_real_name , a.we_file_type , b.we_ins_date , a.we_file_down , (select c.we_user_nick FROM we_user c WHERE c.we_user_idx = b.we_ins_user) AS we_user_nick FROM we_wiki_file a INNER JOIN we_wiki b ON a.we_wiki_idx = b.we_wiki_idx WHERE b.we_space_idx=#{spaceIdx} order by we_file_idx desc limit 0, 5;

SELECT a.we_user_idx , a.we_ins_date , a.we_space_idx , a.we_join_status , b.we_user_nick FROM we_space_join a inner join we_user b on a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx WHERE we_space_idx=#{spaceIdx} AND we_join_type='INVITE'

SELECT a.we_space_join_idx , a.we_user_idx , a.we_space_idx , a.we_ins_date , a.we_join_status , b.we_user_nick FROM we_space_join a inner join we_user b on a.we_user_idx = b.we_user_idx WHERE we_space_idx=#{spaceIdx} AND we_join_type='REQUEST' AND we_join_status in ('REQUEST', 'REAPPLICATION')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO we_space_user ( we_space_idx, we_user_idx, we_view_permit, we_insert_permit, we_edit_permit, we_ins_date ) Values ( #{we_space_idx}, #{we_user_idx}, #{we_view_permit}, #{we_insert_permit}, #{we_edit_permit}, #{we_ins_date} )
